answers.answer: You don't have an HIV concern.

question: Hi had unprotected sex  with a female student in early march, diagnosed with chlamydia , had a bad yeast infection shortly after in groin and on penis very itchy and did not respond well to treatment.  keeps going away and coming back.  never had it before until after this encounterhad a test after 8.5-9 weeks for HIV negativea month later tested for diabetes (worried about yeast) negative for that, cbc all normala month after that approximately 16-17 weeks tested for HIV again, negativequestions -  1)any chance there was a mix up with the lab and I could be positive? 2) What should i do about yeast ive been to several doctors and prescribed txs don't work well at all or only temporary 3) I smoke marijuana more than I should, could that cause a delay in antibodies?  4) Am I FOR SURE HIV negative?thanks for your time
title: recurring yeast
